column4: This doesn;t seem to get my internal speaker working ... hmm sudo modprobe pcspkr
At a console tty or an xterm / gnome-terminal?
Do alert sounds from other applications play?
Jordun_U getting an alert every time you reply to me
9.04 , tried this also to load the module sudo modprobe pcspkr
Does your computer have a hardware beep? Many computers don't ( in 9.10 the hardware beep is disabled but gnome-terminal uses the system alert sound instead )
So in 9.04, IIRC, if you don't have a hardware beep you won't hear anything from echo -e '\a'
how can I tell if I have a hardware beep ?
One way you can test if you have hardware beep is by installing the "beep" package and running "beep"
Laptops generally don't have hardware beep. I don't know off hand how you can configure 9.04 to act like 9.10 and use the system alert sound instead.
- so its a system alert that I'm trying to call ... thought this would the easy part
